tab.label:

                        .config-nav-block.nwhale-tab .title {
                            padding-top: 15px;

                            margin-right: 5px;

field.label: Required attributes
field.comment: Comma separated list of attribute codes which must remain mandatory. email_address,password and confirmation are already on the list
